jcolibri.extensions.textual.method
Class StemmerMethod

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.cbrcore.CBRMethod
      jcolibri.extensions.textual.method.StemmerMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, CBRTerm
public class StemmerMethod
extends CBRMethod

This method can perform several stemmer algorithms for diferent languages.

Default language is English, but developers can choose another language configuration using the LANGUAGE_ATTRIBUTE parameter

Although other languages are providen, actually you must use English because the remainder layers only works with this language

This method uses the SnowBall package: http://snowball.tartarus.org

Developed at: Robert Gordon University - Aberdeen & Facultad Informática, Universidad Complutense de Madrid (GAIA)

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Antonio Recio García
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

Stemm

static java.lang.String Stemm(java.lang.String word)
Static method used to stemm words after the execution of this method.

So you can only call this method after the call to execute()

Exactly, this method is used by the glossary method.

Parameters:
word - Word to stemm
Returns:
Stemmed word

execute

public CBRContext execute(CBRContext context)
                   throws ExecutionException
Iterates over all cases extracting their Texts and invokes stemmer()

Specified by:
execute in class CBRMethod
Parameters:
context - context prior to method execution.
Returns:
context updated after method execution.
Throws:
ExecutionException

stemmer

void stemmer(java.util.Collection texts)
Stemms the words contained in the texts and stores the stemmed word in each token using the Tokens.STEMMEDWORD attribute

Parameters:
texts - Collection of Texts objects
